attributes.action: Make sure the killers of Baby P receive full life sentences with no possibility of parole.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This was the outrageous and remorsless torture and killing of an innocent and defenseless baby boy. We believe that a civilised society cannot possibly allow those responsible to ever enjoy freedom again.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
